name: Escalador Loco
description: Escalador Loco is, as its title indicates (literally, a Spanish translation of Crazy Climber), an unofficial version of the classic game designed by Shigeki Fujiwara. As in Crazy Climber, our courageous protagonist must reach the top of the skyscraper while at the same time trying to avoid the objects that fall from above. In order to reach the top our hero must use the windows, but it will not be an easy task, as we should also avoid that the window we are grasping closes in front of us, otherwise he would fall to the ground and our mission would fail.

shot.caption: The game starts by displaying the instructions
The instructions are followed by the title screen
Objects are dropped from windows and the player must avoid them or else .....
... they will be knocked from their position
Falling objects are avoided by moving to the side. Of course the objects start falling from over to the side as a consequence, tracking the players movements
The game's high score table is not populated so any score will be recorded
Made it to the top! From here the game restarts without going back to a menu
